title: Disable log compression in pipeline.groovy
body: It's currently incompatible with the changes Jenkins is making as part of JEP-210: https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-54680

comments.author: mikekinsman
comments.body:

For more details, please refer to the [build report](https://opbuildstorageprod.blob.core.windows.net/report/2018%5C11%5C26%5C81ca5486-8c50-0a94-05c4-486e23e99ecf%5CPullRequest%5C201811261734489431-708%5Cworkflow_report.html?sv=2015-02-21&sr=b&sig=Byci6C8bPoSkFNQawlm9SJqvx21jwIPS0m7D%2F8dVNbE%3D&st=2018-11-26T17%3A32%3A05Z&se=2018-12-27T17%3A37%3A05Z&sp=r).

comments.author: akoeplinger
comments.body: @mattleibow sigh, turns out you actually need to make an empty `properties ( [ ] )` instead otherwise it'll keep the previous value: https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/709

comments.author: akoeplinger
comments.body: Does it automatically end up in the `development` branch or do I need another PR?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Automatic! Almost... I use the development branch for larger work items so I can have a "stable" master and an "almost stable" master :)
